publish_an_asset.name: publish_an_asset
publish_an_asset.description: This tool publishes a specified asset from a selected branch to one or more environments and locales within a stack, with optional scheduling for future deployment. Keywords: asset publishing, environment.

branch.description: Select a branch from your stack.

environments.description: Select the environment(s) in which you want to publish the asset.

locales.description: Select the locale(s) in which you want to publish the asset.

scheduled_at.description: Schedule the asset publish in ‘YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS’ format.

remove_localization.name: remove_localization
remove_localization.description: This tool removes the localized version of a specified entry in a given locale, restoring the entry to its original non-localized state within the selected branch and content type. Keywords: localization, revert.

branch.description: Select a branch from your stack.

content_type_name.description: Select a content type to remove the localized version of the entry.

entry_id.description: Select an entry to restore to its original non-localized state.

locale.description: Select a locale (language) to remove the entry's localization in the selected locale. The entry must be localized in the selected locale.

unpublish_asset.name: unpublish_asset
unpublish_asset.description: This tool unpublishes a specified asset from selected environments and locales within a given branch, with optional scheduling for deferred execution.

branch.description: Select a branch from your stack.

asset.description: Select an asset which you want to unpublish.

environments.description: Select an environment to unpublish the asset.

locales.description: Select the locale in which the asset should be unpublished.

scheduled_at.description: Schedule the asset unpublish in ‘YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS’ format.

publish_an_entry.name: publish_an_entry
publish_an_entry.description: This tool publishes a specified entry from a selected content type to one or more environments and locales within a designated branch of the stack. Content publishing, environments

branch.description: Select a branch from your stack.

content_type_name.description: Select a content type to publish the entry.

entry_uid.description: Select an entry's uid to publish.

locales.description: Select the locale(s) in which you want to publish the entry.

environments.description: Select the environment(s) in which you want to publish the entry.

scheduled_at.description: Schedule the entry publish in ‘YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS’ format.

publish_variants_of_an_entry.name: publish_variants_of_an_entry
publish_variants_of_an_entry.description: This tool publishes specified entry variants to selected environments and locales within a defined branch, supporting variant group targeting for content type entries. Keywords: publish, variants

branch.description: Select a branch from your stack.

content_type_name.description: Select a content type to publish the entry’s variant.

entry.description: Select an entry to publish its variant.

variant_group_uid.description: Select the Variant Group to publish the variant.

variant_ids.description: Select the variant(s) to publish its content. You can select multiple variants.

locales.description: Select the locale(s) in which you want to publish the entry’s variant. You can select multiple locales.

environments.description: Select the environment(s) in which you want to publish the entry’s variant. You can select multiple environments.

scheduled_at.description: Schedule the publish schedule in ‘YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS’ format.

set_entry_workflow.name: set_entry_workflow
set_entry_workflow.description: This tool assigns a specified workflow stage to a content entry within a defined branch and content type in a Contentstack stack. Workflow management, entry status

branch.description: Select a branch from your stack.

content_type_name.description: Select a content type to set the workflow stage of an entry.

entry_id.description: Select an entry for which you want to set the workflow stage.

workflow_stage_uid.description: Select a workflow stage that needs to be set for the entry.

assigned_to.description: Select the assignee name(s) to let the user(s) know about the workflow update.

assigned_by_roles.description: Select the role(s) to send a notification to all the users with the selected role.

due_date.description: Enter the due date to update the workflow in ‘YYYY/MM/DD’ format.

comments.description: Enter a comment for the user to acknowledge the workflow update.

locale.description: Select a locale in which you want to set the entry workflow stage.

unpublish_an_entry.name: unpublish_an_entry
unpublish_an_entry.description: This tool unpublishes a specified entry from selected environments and locales within a Contentstack stack branch, removing the entry from the CDN and making it inaccessible via delivery APIs. Keywords: unpublish, entry

branch.description: Select a branch from your stack.

content_type_name.description: Select a content type to unpublish the entry.

environments.description: Select the environment(s) from where you want to unpublish the entry.

locales.description: Select the locale(s) to unpublish the entry in that locale.

scheduled_at.description: When left blank, the unpublish schedule is set to "now." You may also enter a UTC time in "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS" format.
